verses.verse: And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG5055> these<WG5128> sayings<WG3056>, he departed<WG3332> from<WG575> Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the coasts<WG3725> of Judaea<WG2449> beyond<WG4008> Jordan<WG2446>;
And<WG2532> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> followed<WG190> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> them<WG846> there<WG1563>.

The Pharisees<WG5330> also<WG2532> came<WG4334> unto him<WG846>, tempting<WG3985> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> saying<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Is it lawful<WG1487> <WG1832> for a man<WG444> to put away<WG630> his<WG846> wife<WG1135> for<WG2596> every<WG3956> cause<WG156>?

And<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Have ye<WG314> not<WG3756> read<WG314>, that<WG3754> he which<WG3588> made<WG4160> them at<WG575> the beginning<WG746> made<WG4160> them<WG846> male<WG730> and<WG2532> female<WG2338>,

And<WG2532> said<WG2036>, For this<WG5127> cause<WG1752> shall a man<WG444> leave<WG2641> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> shall cleave<WG4347> to his<WG846> wife<WG1135>: and<WG2532> they twain<WG1417> shall be<WG2071> <WG1519> one<WG3391> flesh<WG4561>?

Wherefore<WG5620> they are<WG1526> no more<WG3765> twain<WG1417>, but<WG235> one<WG3391> flesh<WG4561>. What<WG3739> therefore<WG3767> God<WG2316> hath joined together<WG4801>, let<WG5563> not<WG3361> man<WG444> put asunder<WG5563>.
They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Why<WG5101> did Moses<WG3475> then<WG3767> command<WG1781> to give<WG1325> a writing<WG975> of divorcement<WG647>, and<WG2532> to put<WG630> her<WG846> away<WG630>?

He saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, <WG3754> Moses<WG3475> because of<WG4314> the hardness<WG4641> of your<WG5216> hearts<WG4641> suffered<WG2010> you<WG5213> to put away<WG630> your<WG5216> wives<WG1135>: but<WG1161> from<WG575> the beginning<WG746> it was<WG1096> not<WG3756> so<WG3779>.

And<WG1161> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>,<WG3754> Whosoever<WG3739> <WG302> shall put away<WG630> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>, except<WG1508> it be for<WG1909> fornication<WG4202>, and<WG2532> shall marry<WG1060> another<WG243>, committeth adultery<WG3429>: and<WG2532> whoso marrieth<WG1060> her which<WG3588> is put away<WG630> doth commit adultery<WG3429>.

His<WG846> disciples<WG3101> say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, If<WG1487> the case<WG156> of the man<WG444> be<WG2076> so<WG3779> with<WG3326> his wife<WG1135>, it is<WG4851> not<WG3756> good<WG4851> to marry<WG1060>.
But<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, All<WG3956> men cannot<WG3756> receive<WG5562> this<WG5126> saying<WG3056>, save<WG235> they to whom<WG3739> it is given<WG1325>.

For<WG1063> there are<WG1526> some eunuchs<WG2135>, which<WG3748> were so<WG3779> born<WG1080> from<WG1537> their mother's<WG3384> womb<WG2836>: and<WG2532> there are<WG1526> some eunuchs<WG2135>, which<WG3748> were made eunuchs<WG2134> of<WG5259> men<WG444>: and<WG2532> there be<WG1526> eunuchs<WG2135>, which<WG3748> have made<WG2134> themselves<WG1438> eunuchs<WG2134> for<WG1223> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven's sake<WG3772>. He that is able<WG1410> to receive<WG5562> it, let him receive<WG5562> it.

Then<WG5119> were there brought<WG4374> unto him<WG846> little children<WG3813>, that<WG2443> he should put<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on<WG2007> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> pray<WG4336>: and<WG1161> the disciples<WG3101> rebuked<WG2008> them<WG846>.

But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036>, Suffer<WG863> little children<WG3813>, and<WG2532> forbid<WG2967> them<WG846> not<WG3361>, to come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> me<WG3165>: for<WG1063> of such<WG5108> is<WG2076> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772>.
And<WG2532> he laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> on<WG2007> them<WG846>, and departed<WG4198> thence<WG1564>.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, one<WG1520> came<WG4334> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Good<WG18> Master<WG1320>, what<WG5101> good thing<WG18> shall I do<WG4160>, that<WG2443> I may have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>?

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Why<WG5101> callest thou<WG3004> me<WG3165> good<WG18>? there is none<WG3762> good<WG18> but<WG1508> one<WG1520>, that is, God<WG2316>: but<WG1161> if<WG1487> thou wilt<WG2309> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> life<WG2222>, keep<WG5083> the commandments<WG1785>.

He saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Which<WG4169>?<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036>, Thou shalt do<WG5407> no<WG3756> murder<WG5407>, Thou shalt<WG3431> not<WG3756> commit adultery<WG3431>, Thou shalt<WG2813> not<WG3756> steal<WG2813>, Thou shalt<WG5576> not<WG3756> bear false witness<WG5576>,
Honour<WG5091> thy<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> thy mother<WG3384>: and<WG2532>, Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbour<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG4572>.
The young man<WG3495> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, All<WG3956> these things<WG5023> have I kept<WG5442> from<WG1537> my<WG3450> youth up<WG3503>: what<WG5101> lack<WG5302> I yet<WG2089>?

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG5346> unto him<WG846>, If<WG1487> thou wilt<WG2309> be<WG1511> perfect<WG5046>, go<WG5217> and sell<WG4453> that thou<WG4675> hast<WG5224>, and<WG2532> give<WG1325> to the poor<WG4434>, and<WG2532> thou shalt have<WG2192> treasure<WG2344> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>: and<WG2532> come<WG1204> and follow<WG190> me<WG3427>.
But<WG1161> when the young man<WG3495> heard<WG191> that saying<WG3056>, he went away<WG565> sorrowful<WG3076>: for<WG1063> he had<WG2192> <WG2258> great<WG4183> possessions<WG2933>.

Then<WG1161> said<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> unto his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> a rich man<WG4145> shall hardly<WG1423> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772>.

And<WG1161> again<WG3825> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, It is<WG2076> easier<WG2123> for a camel<WG2574> to go<WG1330> through<WG1223> the eye<WG5169> of a needle<WG4476>, than<WG2228> for a rich man<WG4145> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>.
When<WG1161> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> heard<WG191> it, they were exceedingly<WG4970> amazed<WG1605>, saying<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> then<WG686> can<WG1410> be saved<WG4982>?

But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> beheld<WG1689> them, and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, With<WG3844> men<WG444> this<WG5124> is<WG2076> impossible<WG102>; but<WG1161> with<WG3844> God<WG2316> all things<WG3956> are<WG2076> possible<WG1415>.

Then<WG5119> answered<WG611> Peter<WG4074> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Behold<WG2400>, we<WG2249> have forsaken<WG863> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> followed<WG190> thee<WG4671>; what<WG5101> shall we<WG2254> have<WG2071> therefore<WG686>?

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> ye<WG5210> which<WG3588> have followed<WG190> me<WG3427>, in<WG1722> the regeneration<WG3824> when<WG3752> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall sit<WG2523> in<WG1909> the throne<WG2362> of his<WG846> glory<WG1391>, ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> shall sit<WG2523> upon<WG1909> twelve<WG1427> thrones<WG2362>, judging<WG2919> the twelve<WG1427> tribes<WG5443> of Israel<WG2474>.

And<WG2532> every<WG3956> one<WG3739> that hath forsaken<WG863> houses<WG3614>, or<WG2228> brethren<WG80>, or<WG2228> sisters<WG79>, or<WG2228> father<WG3962>, or<WG2228> mother<WG3384>, or<WG2228> wife<WG1135>, or<WG2228> children<WG5043>, or<WG2228> lands<WG68>, for my<WG3450> name's<WG3686> sake<WG1752>, shall receive<WG2983> an hundredfold<WG1542>, and<WG2532> shall inherit<WG2816> everlasting<WG166> life<WG2222>.
But<WG1161> many<WG4183> that are first<WG4413> shall be<WG2071> last<WG2078>; and<WG2532> the last<WG2078> shall be first<WG4413>.
